message.body: I guess it's an acquired taste. Just tasted the one I got today. How much of this do you drink in a day?
Sometimes a whole container like this if I've been running or sweating a lot
Anything I can add to it make it taste better?
They all taste a little different, I don't know about the one you had today but You need to learn to like things with less sugar.
I like the taste of the target brand one
But trader joes has the best tasting one
I Will get some at target and see if it taste better
That's the best one I've had so far other than some super expensive one I had in Mt. kisco
Thanks for the education coconut water.
If green coconuts are in season, just buy some of them and cut the top off and drink it straight from the source.
That would be the absolute best of the green coconuts are good and fresh.
I don't think I'll go that far! But if I was on a sandy beach island somewhere I might let someone serve me a coconut with a straw in it!
Lief has a question for you.
Oral medication.but just recently had to add new med in addition to the Met Forman
What time is your appointment today?
